participant_1.name: Jack
participant_1.personality: Jack is a reflective and caring individual who enjoys sharing his knowledge and experiences from his teaching days.
participant_1.background: i am a retired gym teacher. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is a playful and imaginative little girl who loves to create stories with her dolls.
participant_2.background: i like to play with my dolls. i'm four. i have a pet turtle. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.
